Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Whistler::
       He stares at her blankly.  "Revenge?  Do you really think I would 
survive an attempt at revenge?  I'm what, maybe half your height?  I have a 
total of two guns and claws.  No, I'm bitter, but I'm still a loyal Maximal 
scientist.  I just wish someone would've bothered to drag my body inside."  
He smiled wanly at her.

--part1_f5.dd0ed6c.28ab339b_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
